features.getDetailsById:
select 
    iss.id as id_issue,
    iss.author,
    iss.posts_number as posts_number_issue,
    iss.pplVoted,
    iss.stars as stars_issue,
    iss.title as title_issue,
    iss.subtitle as subtitle_issue,
    iss.tags as tags_issue,
    iss.views as views_issues,
    iss.created_at,
      pst.id as id_post,
      pst.id_author,
      pst.stars as stars_post,
      issTxt.context,
      issTxt.enableNotifications,
      issTxt.deleted_at
      from  issue iss 
        inner join post pst on pst.id_issue in (iss.id)
        inner join issue_text_content issTxt on issTxt.id_post in (pst.id)
        and issTxt.id_issue in (iss.id) 
              where iss.id =
